snippet: Tens of thousands of Muslims are being forced by Christian militias to flee the country in a violent exodus that has left neighborhoods in the capital empty.
abstract: Tens of thousands of Muslims are being forced by Christian militias to flee Central African Republic in what human rights groups and a top United Nations official characterizes as de facto ethnic cleansing.
lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of Muslims are being forced by Christian militias to flee the country in a violent exodus that has left neighborhoods in the capital empty.

headline.main: Warnings of Ethnic Cleansing in Central African Republic
headline.print_headline: Warnings of Ethnic Cleansing in Central African Republic

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
